title: It's Not Too Early to Teach Your Kids About God
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
If you're a mom or a dad, you're the best person to show your kids that following God is more than going to church on Sunday mornings. John and Danny describe how to encourage your child's faith from an early age.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Dr. David Clarke's book "Parenting is Hard and Then You Die" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-05?refcd=1084201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/its-not-too-early-to-teach-your-kids-about-god/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
